name: Color Blob Dash
description:
A local battle-royale game inspired by a very popular current game. Pick a blob and race through an obstacle course. First blob to reach the finish line wins.

Well, at least that's what it was supposed to be. For now, use the green blob and try to get to the finish in the shortest time without opponents :). I'll update it as soon as I possible with all the remaining features.

Note: Please click on the internal fullscreen button for proper resolution. Also, no sound yet. Sorry.

Controls: Arrow keys/ WASD

Mini Jam 62:

This game was made for Mini Jam 62 with the theme COLORS and a limitation of only 2 frames for animations.

As per the limitation, all animations in the game consist of at most 2 frames only. The theme is incorporated through the main obstacle of the game, i.e. paintball turrets that switch color every few seconds. A blob gets stunned for a few seconds if a paintball of the same color as them hits them.

Most assets were made by me during the Jam while the tilemap and some lobby decorations are from an earlier, un-published game.

Please leave some feedback if you play :) .
